title: The Mason Ho Point of View Featuring the etnies Scout
description:
From Mason Ho’s Point of View, when there are waves on the horizon, he is in the water. Once the waves subside, he waits beachside, scouting out the next swell. The etnies Scout’s incredible comfort makes it the perfect traveling companion for anyone, anywhere to keep the spirit of adventure alive.
See more of Mason and the etnies Scout at etnies.com: etni.es/mason-pov
tags: etnies,buy a shoe plant a tree,surfing,mason ho,northshore,northshore surfing,scout,etnies scout,travel,adventure
